Support

Where can I download Pear?

Unfortunately the algorithm we made does not work for people of the same sex. But we love everyone, and we would like everyone, independently to their sex orientation to join our community. So we are working for you guys! We are trying to create a new algorithm that will work. Hopefully an update, or another version of Pear, will come out soon. So…stay tuned!

If you have other questions, or other technical issues, please contact us at support@pear.com
